text.content: Wow. Okay.
That game was a new low.
When people hear that Buffy the Vampire Slayer did that in front of strangers... well...
Actually, um...
The thing is...
Buffy the Vampire Slayer actually didn't do that.

Common mistake.
The real Buffy wouldn't be caught dead playing strip poker!
I'm actually a highly sophisticated robot built by Andrew and Warren.
Andrew made me look and sound just like her - but he made me follow orders.
Even orders to humiliate myself in games of strip poker.
Look, I'll prove it! Give me an order.
Tell me to touch my toes, or recite the alphabet backwards, or pick my nose!
Um...
That's not really what I had in mind.
But...
Okay.

If she were here. Which she's not.

After all...
This is what I was made for.
